author: The Blind Dev
title: Konversion Koncept — FiFo Phil's File Flippening
summary: Established dual-mode converter between .svg and .png formats with in-browser processing
Implemented ImageTracer.js pipeline for .png to .svg vectorization with 256-color support
Added full aspect-ratio preservation and dynamic canvas rasterization for .svg to .png
Preview and download interfaces completed with minimal UI and Phil's branded styling
Under active development — targeting mobile optimization, drag-and-drop input, and batch mode
